articles.description: The booster appeared to miss the landing pad of the company's droneship in the Atlantic Monday night.
articles.content:
A Falcon 9 loaded with Starlink satellites prepares for launch.
SpaceX
After successfully sending another batch of its Starlink broadband satellites into orbit Monday night from Florida's Cape Cana… [+2603 chars]
